I have been wearing Unequal chest protectors, shoulder pads, and thigh pads for much of the late and post-season-- resulting in pain-free playing,'' stated Michael Vick . The Unequal technology is a part of my game now and I won't play without my Unequal. Unequal's protective power gives me a whole new level of confidence in my game. It makes me feel invincible. The Microsoft founder`` knows an increasingly bad investment when he sees it,'' says Chris Nerney in ITworld. Microsoft's stock has languished for the past decade, and the company is now a hapless also-ran in a number of crucial, emerging markets. Why? Steve Ballmer .
